name: Beef up
played_power: +1 action; any time you scuffle this turn, get +1 intimidation

name: Friendship bracelet
played_power:
Roll a die: +1 resource based on your roll; other players with a Friendship bracelet in play get the same:
1 → lunch money
2 → hallway
3 → rock
4 → card
hand_power: +1 gumball if at least one other player has a Friendship bracelet in play

name: Gum swap
hand_power: Trade any resource for two gumballs, once

name: Pocket mulch
played_power: +1 hallway, which you may immediately build on top of opponents’ hallways

name: Dibs
played_power: Place 2 lunch money on the board to block a space. Next turn, build on that space or unblock it and add the lunch money to your supply

name: Extra credit
played_power: Add this card to your binder; +1 gumball on reveal

name: Horsin’ around
played_power: +1 action; +1 card; if any other players have a horse girl in their hand, scuffle them without negative consequences for either
hand_power: Buy horse girl cards for 1 fewer

name: Just a peek
played_power: +1 action, reorder the top 3 cards of your deck

name: Just borrowing
played_power: Randomly draw a card from two opponents’ hands for you to use during this reveal. The cards then go back into their hands.

name: Mane squeeze
played_power: Pick a player—they are now your boyfriend; to scuffle, you all have to break up, which costs an action for them but is free for you
hand_power: Trade 1 of your resources for 1 of your boyfriend’s, at your sole discretion; again if they have a horse girl in their hand; if no boyfriend: trade with the supply once

name: Neigh sayer
hand_power: Reveal this card when attacked to block the scuffle entirely (attacker still loses the action); keep in your hand

name: Smacking
played_power: Trash this card; +1 action; +1 card; +2 gumballs during reveal

name: Threequal
played_power: Gain a card from the mall ≤ this card’s value, or trash this card to gain a card ≤ +2 this card’s value; if it’s a mathlete, add to your binder

name: Bait master
hand_power: Reveal this card when attacked, after rock reveal, for +3 intimidation; keep it in your hand

name: Booster pack
played_power: Draw 3 cards and discard 1

name: Food fight
played_power: Initiate a scuffle and spend up to 3 lunch money for extra intimidation, 1:1

name: Gobble gobble
played_power: Draw 3 cards: keep 2 & trash 1 or discard all

name: I’ll be having that
played_power: You may build a base 2 hallways from your nearest structure, +1 hallway

name: Mommy won’t mind
played_power: Trash any card from your deck; +1 card
hand_power: Trash a card from your hand (you don’t get its reveal bonus)

name: Pony up
played_power:
Roll a die: +1 resource based on your roll; other players with a horse girl in play get the same; then you take any 1 of their resources
1 → lunch money
2 → hallway
3 → rock
4 → card

name: Teacher-sanctioned fight
played_power: Initiate a scuffle and spend up to 3 hallways for extra intimidation, 1:1

name: Test prep
played_power: Add all mathletes in your hand, including this one, to your binder, +1 gumball on reveal

name: Balanced meal
played_power: Spend lunch money as gumballs on your reveal; +1 lunch money

name: Candy in December
played_power: You may keep cards in your hand this turn rather than revealing them; +2 cards

name: Contraband
played_power: Spend hallways as gumballs on your reveal; +1 hallway

name: Deck master 300
played_power: Draw 3 cards: play one, keep one, and trash one or discard all

name: High 5
played_power: Gain a card from the mall ≤ this card’s value, or trash this card to gain a card ≤ +2 this card’s value; if it’s a mathlete, add to your binder

name: Insecure bully
played_power: Initiate a scuffle. If you win, +1 action +1 card

name: Less than three
played_power: Draw up to two mathletes from your deck into your binder; add this card to your binder

name: Telephone
played_power: Put a rain pail in an open slot of an opponent’s base that shares a tile with a base of yours; get that rain pail’s resources, until they upgrade that base and kick you out

name: Why so sticky?
played_power: Spend cards as gumballs on your reveal, +1 card

name: You wanna go?
played_power:
Spend a rock: scuffle all players at once (no rocks or upgrades). 
1st → +1 Clout,
2nd → +2 any resource,
3rd → you may trash a card from your hand & add it to 4th’s discard pile.
Only you get rewards. Ties: take the lower reward.
hand_power: +1 of the resource you have most of

name: Fresh pack
played_power:
Count the gumballs of the top 3 cards of your deck: 
if 1-2 → gain any resource
if 3-4 → +2 gumballs
if 5+ → +1 Clout;
reorder the cards drawn
hand_power:
Roll a die: +1 resource based on your roll
1 → lunch money
2 → hallway
3 → rock
4 → card

name: Young capitalist
played_power: +1 card; discard x cards for +2x gumballs on reveal
hand_power: You may add this card to your binder to get its gumballs later

name: 7 up
played_power: Gain a card from the mall ≤ this card’s value, or trash this card to gain a card ≤ +2 this card’s value; if it’s a mathlete, add to your binder

name: Big bubbles
played_power: +1 action; +1 card; buy Clout for 2 fewer on your reveal

name: Friendship handcuffs
played_power: Add a horse girl card from the mall to an opponent’s deck; +1 action; +1 card
hand_power: +1 any resource; if other players have a horse girl in their hand: +1 any resource of your choosing for you both

name: Wanna race?
played_power: +2 actions; +1 card

name: You wanna GOAT?
played_power:
Spend a rock: scuffle all players at once without rocks or upgrades. 
1st → +1 Clout,
2nd → +2 any resource,
3rd → you may trash a card from your hand & add it to 4th’s discard pile.
Only you get rewards. Ties: take the higher reward.

name: Cargo shorts
played_power: Take the action of the next card you play this turn twice; +1 gumball on reveal
hand_power: Use the reveal power of one of the cards in your hand twice

name: Dollhouse
played_power: Roll a die: take an upgrade pole based on your roll (1→duct tape or spikes, 2→rain pail, 3→mulch, 4→cloutpost)

name: Relentless bully
played_power: Initiate a scuffle: you can keep scuffling, as long as you keep winning

name: Explore
played_power: +1 hallway or use any 3 resources to add a tile to the board and trash this card

name: Fort up
played_power: Gain 1 of any resource

name: Gum
played_power: +1 gumball on reveal; add this card back to hand after turn

name: I’m not sharing
played_power:
Roll the dice, only you pick up.
If < 4 bases, you may roll again, everyone picks up

name: Rummage
played_power: Roll the dice: if odd → +1 gumball, if even → +2 gumballs for your reveal

name: Starter deck
played_power: Draw 2 cards; discard 1

name: Trenchcoat
played_power: Exchange resources for other resources at a rate of 2:1, up to two times
